name: data-card-18
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Circle Push.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Circle Push.

flavor_text.black_white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Circle Push.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Circle Push.
